scripts.s2:login: npm config set @s2global:registry=https://s2global-585953033457.d.codeartifact.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/npm/S2/ && aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository S2 --domain-owner 585953033457 --domain s2global --namespace @s2global --region us-east-2
scripts.cs:login: aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository certscanui --domain s2global --domain-owner 585953033457 --namespace @cs --region us-east-2
scripts.preinsta: npm config set @s2global:registry=https://s2global-585953033457.d.codeartifact.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/npm/S2/ ; aws codeartifact login --tool npm --repository S2 --domain-owner 585953033457 --domain s2global --namespace '@s2global' --region us-east-2
scripts.preinstall: npm run cs:login & npm run co:login
